hero.headline: When cyber risk turns legal, speed and defensibility matter.
hero.subheadline: CyberGlobal Law helps CISOs and General Counsel manage incidents, regulators, and contracts across borders—24/7.

empathy.title: You're Under Pressure. We Get It.
empathy.description: You're under pressure to act fast, inform the right people, and avoid over-disclosure. We've helped organizations across SaaS, finance, healthcare, and critical infrastructure navigate incidents and audits with calm, clear steps and a defensible record.

services.title: How We Help
services.subtitle: Five core practice areas covering the full lifecycle of cyber-legal challenges

finalCta.title: Ready When You Need Us
finalCta.subtitle: Whether you're facing an active incident or planning ahead, we're here to help.
finalCta.slaDetails: 30-minute callback for incidents · Next business day for consultations

footer.description: Boutique Cyber Law practice with 24/7 incident response and proactive compliance across EU (GDPR/NIS2/DORA/eIDAS2) and cross-border work.
footer.barStatement: Licensed to practice law in [Jurisdiction]. Bar membership: [Bar Association].

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch for 24/7 incident response, consultations, or general inquiries.
contact.formSubtitle: For non-urgent inquiries, please use the form below. We'll respond within 1 business day.
contact.bookingSubtitle: Schedule a 30-minute consultation to discuss compliance, contracts, incident response planning, or regulatory matters.
contact.confidentialityText: Submitting this form does not create an attorney-client relationship. Please do not include confidential or sensitive information until we confirm representation via an engagement letter.

form.name: Name
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll respond within 1 business day.
form.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

cookie.title: We value your privacy
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
